summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2980, for the improvement of East 50th Street, from 35th Avenue Northeast to Railroad Avenue Northeast, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same where necessary; by constructing curbs and gutters; and providing for the necessary surface drainage.under Ordinance No. 35896 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
